lines.text: And just take an hour of flight, for as long as the weather holds.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're making the move, huh? We're going to pass now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, it'll speed us up a bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we are for sure trying to go to A2? We're not going to try and sidetrack to A4; A2 is the goal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I thought we were going to stop by to stop and talk to Essek.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A2 is still along the way, unless we deviate completely.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And A2's on this side of the lava river, We wouldn't have to cross.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So maybe we don't cross, then.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we want to go to A2.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But we have to cross the lava river eventually, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, not to get to A2.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we're going to have to, one way or the other.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just depends on where we want to go to first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It feels like it's between A2 and A4, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, the lava river literally splits A2 and Aeor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anybody want to flip a coin?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We could maybe try to beat them there and get what they're after, and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Try to leave before they show up?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we go to A2, I don't see any point in going unless we try and beat them there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or we deviate and we go to A4 and we don't have competition.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we know how big A4 is? Because like, if it's gigantic, we won't even know what to look for.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can do it. We should also just see if we're being watched before we do it, because we make the move, they'll know.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But how do we know that they're not going to-- We know that they're going to A2.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What else do we need to know?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I feel like we should assume that we will be seen no matter what we do and we just book it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is it, this is the one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What is it you want from the intervention?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: ♪ I want to know what love is ♪

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If we'll find something to beat the Tomb Takers at their game.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, Traveler, you piece of shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry. Come on, Artagan, you piece of shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we think of a third question?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. Should we head to A2? What would the second one be?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are they going to A2? Are we being watched?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are there threshold crests at A4 or A2? Because we know Molly is going-- Lucien is going to A2.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Remind me why we think A4 instead of Aeor itself?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because I think Aeor is the final goal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wouldn't that be to alpha and then alpha and then Aeor being alpha?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A4 is further east, keep saying Aeor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because A4 might have another special--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Before Aeor and A2, are the one we're heading towards.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And A4 is, like, to the east.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, I'm going to roll a Commune.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And once it's taking hold: Are the Tomb Takers heading to A2?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the breath seems to draw you in a north-northwestern direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: accustomed to inhaling, begins to lose its cold temperature and become almost beachside warm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that a yes or a no?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does one of these threshold crests that they're looking for exist at A4?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The air doesn't-- it reverts to a colder temperature but not the freezing temperature that hurts the lungs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't necessarily know if they're collecting those or--?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know, that's my thought.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's no way to protect against that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not that I can think of.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I have this on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It could be happening at any time and we don't know when.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Those are the only three questions you get, it's not five?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Five is Speak with Dead, three is speak with god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it time to talk to...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What, like See Invisibility? Sure, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take the sword and I'll cast See Invisibility.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, glancing on the space around you, you do not see any sign of a similar scrying beacon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It actually seems clear right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think they probably poke in on us on occasion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The same way that I do, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Be a good time to make a move then.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we need help, it's my feeling.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's my feeling, is we need help.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Essek is far away from A2.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, if they're going to A2 and we could try to beat them there, figure out what it is they're after there, take it, once we do that, we are daring them to attack, but we could take whatever we find straight to Aeor, which is where Essek is, correct? He's on the edge of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we can do all that, that would be amazing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lucien may continue to play it as a game, too, and just see how many of these things that we'll get

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As long as we're all taking it to the same place, I doubt it really even matters to him who has what, if it ends up where it needs to be.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: For A2 we don't need to cross.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We could fly, pause and re-up and...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As long as we don't want to burn everything we have in case something happens.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who can do what, how are we doing it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, this is the plan for now, for this moment?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess we're going to A2, trying to beat them there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If I Polymorph two people will we all be able to travel?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We got to bring Dagen, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want to be an eagle?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Polymorph on me and Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, and with that, you have three giant eagles at your disposal. Who's riding with who?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Man, your tricks are all kinds of weird, but I like your style."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I grab his ride and then--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord and Veth, here we go!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh man, that was so funny.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay yeah, that was a full Ashley Johnson "uh-oh." (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fucking Jester MVP in that shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mind you, a part of me was-- I was excited for the carnage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But that was fucking hilarious and very clever, well done.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god. I had a heart attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And just culminating in a piece of glitter on the map.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That he moved to attack me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It flipped upside down for some reason.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just feel like that's a metaphor for something, but I'm not sure what.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And, is it Thursday yet? Good night! (cheering)
